article.headline: Samford 71, E. Illinois 45
article.story: BIRMINGHAM, Ala. (AP) -- Randall Gulina scored a game-high 23 on points 6-of-10 shooting in Samford's 71-45 victory over Eastern Illinois on Saturday. The Ohio Valley Conference game was the regular-season finale for both teams and it will most likely be the final game played in Samford's 45-year-old Seibert Hall. Samford (15-15, 12-8) took a swift lead with early points from Gulina, who finished with a near-perfect 10-of-11 from the free-throw line. He also moved into 14th place on Samford's all-time scoring list with 1,204 career points. The Bulldogs closed the first half ahead 31-15 after holding the Panthers (10-20, 6-14) to 25 percent shooting from the field. Samford's Travis Peterson scored 15 points on 6-of-8 shooting while Jerry Smith chipped in 10 points and went 6-of-6 from the free-throw line. Smith set Samford's all-time career assist record Saturday with 426 to surpass former Bulldog-great Al Walter's previous mark of 424. Romain Martin led Eastern Illinois with 16 points. With the victory, Samford ended its five-game losing streak and will begin play in the OVC Tournament on Tuesday. Samford will move next door from Seibert Hall to the new $32 million Pete Hanna Center in 2007-08.

statistics.name: points
statistics.description: The number of points scored.

statistics.name: fieldGoals
statistics.description: Field Goal makes and attempts.

statistics.name: freeThrows
statistics.description: Free Throw makes and attempts.

statistics.name: assists
statistics.description: The number of times a player who passes the ball to a teammate in a way that leads to a score by field goal, meaning that he or she was "assisting" in the basket. There is some judgment involved in deciding whether a passer should be credited with an assist.

statistics.name: turnovers
statistics.description: The number of times a player loses possession to the other team.

statistics.name: minutes
statistics.description: The total number of minutes played.

statistics.name: assistTurnoverRatio
statistics.description: The average number of assists a player or team records per turnover

statistics.name: rebounds
statistics.description: The total number of rebounds (offensive and defensive).

statistics.description: The number of times when the defense obtains the possession of the ball after a missed shot by the offense.
